O

olimpo - package olimpo
Greek representation of project's components.
opArray(int, Double[], Double[]) - Static method in class misc.Utils
It manages two arrays and produces a new one, using the rule: new[i] = array1[i] + operation * array2[i]
operation - package operation
Provides classis for operate and executing max sum algorithm.
Operator - Interface in operation
This interface force to implement all the needed method for computing all possible MaxSum variants.

This interface provides methods for oplus operator
